text: Herman "Junior" Parker (March 27, 1932 â€“ November 18, 1971) was an American blues singer and musician. He is best remembered for his voice which has been described as "honeyed" and "velvet-smooth". He was born in Coahoma County, Mississippi. He died of a brain tumour in 1971. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Singers from Mississippi Category:American blues musicians
title: Junior Parker
